author: dapplion
content: <@!97774605351010304> Monitoring some deposits today the estimate of beaconcha.in was waay of. If you track the current queue churn you can give the user the exact epoch of activation once eth1_data is voted.

author: dapplion
content: If you point me to the current implementation I can help improve it to get more precision

author: dapplion
content: The estimate will be even better that etherscan's one which is better but still naive
